He smiled again.

"Well, see how I am half transformer, half organic?  The organic part of m=
e
can 'eat' others to retain energy.  Also, my other ability you may find
q=
uite interesting," he said,  and paused.

Skulletron smiled and continued, "I have the unique ability to get into
an=
ybody's mind and attempt to change their emotion, most often to make
killin=
g easier in battle."

-------Original Message-------

From: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Date: August 09, 2002 05:47:38 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: Wolfenstein, Perceptor Approaching...

Perceptor::

"What're your skills, skulletron?"replied Perceptor





--- In nbwrpg@y..., "LurkerAbyss" <1641coburn@r...> wrote:
> Skulletron grinned and looked at them.
>=20
> "The name's Skulletron.  I belong to no faction right now.  I was=20
hoping to
> join one as soon as possible.  Perhaps you could help me out with=20
that?" he
> explained.
>=20
> -------Original Message-------
>=20
> From: nbwrpg@y...
> Date: August 09, 2002 05:37:12 PM
> To: nbwrpg@y...
> Subject: Re: Wolfenstein, Perceptor Approaching...
>=20
> Perceptor::
>=20
> POercepor looked at the strange bot and said "Who're you??? what's=20
> your faction???"
>=20
>=20
>=20
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "LurkerAbyss" <1641coburn@r...> wrote:
> > After recieving no response from anybody inside the  Predacon=20
base,=20
> he assumed they were either busy or gone.  He started to walk away,=20
> when his long-range scanners picked up two bots in the distance
> (Wolfenstein and Perceptor).  He waited for the two bots to come=20
into=20
> sight, so he would have a chance to actually talk to others in this=20
> strange, new world...
>=20
>=20
